name: Crystal Mist
description:
This is a deckbuilding game, that was made in a month for Devtober 2022 on itch.io. It's the my first time making a full Android game! :)

The objective of the game is to win battles:

To win a battle, you need to defeat the enemies, by either:

    -Depleting their HP (Health Points)

    -Or depleting their WP (Willpower Points)

Different cards have different effect on these values.

You gain gold by winning battles, and you can buy cards in shops.

Reach the top to win the game.

Little quirks that I didn't have time to fix :-( :

    -Every card must be used on an enemy (so, that includes a card targetting the hero for example)

    -Card movement can be a bit janky if you play too fast   

Thanks for playing!!
